name: CarWreck.io
description:
Control your wrecking car. Compete in a demolition derby versus enemy players. Destroy as many vehicles as you can and become the best driver!


- Easy, one finger controls.
- Free to play!
- Play it anywhere anytime.
- Beautiful, sunny level.
- Suitable for all ages.
- Wrecking mechanic!

Start playing CarWreck.io today - join Orbital Knight community loved by millions all over the world.
